mapper.insert: insert into tDlbOrderMoneyLog ( bizType, orderId, tradeNo, tenant, amount, currency, authcode, orderIp) values (#{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select bizType, orderId, tradeNo, tenant, amount, currency, authcode, orderIp from tDlbOrderMoneyLog
